body.p: I Richard Hawes, Provisional Governor of the State of Kentucky, by virtue of authority in me vested by the laws of Said State, and Reposing especial confidence in the skill, ability & patriotism of T. T. Smith a ctizen of Lousville, Jefferson County Kentucky do by these presents nominate & appoint the said T. T. Smith my military aid. In testimony of which I have had my name & affixed my private seal, the date above.

R. Hawes
Provl Govr of Ky.,

The Confederate Governor of Kentucky.
Col TT.S.to CII 187th

To Capn John Boyd
from Chas Herbet late 2nd Ky Inf CSA
Macon
